alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 25 at 9:37PM CDT until July 25 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Loup County in north central Nebraska... Western Garfield County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 937 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 14 miles northwest of Taylor, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Taylor around 1010 PM CDT. Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Nunda Shoal Campground, Homestead Knolls Campground, Valley View Flat Campground, Horseshoe Bend Lake and Hannamon Bayou Campground. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 123 and 144. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
